name: What-da-ya-have
body: Group project in which we utilized jQuery/Ajax and used 3 API's to create an application that would give restaurants in close proximity to Marta Stations as well as the train schedule and local weather.

name: Employee Template Engine
body: Node CLI that takes in information about employees and generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person. Utilized internal Node.js packages fs, path, and jest for testing.

name: ReadMe Generator
body: This was an introduction to Node.js and server side programming. Used the inquirer package to get info from user, capture the response, and use the fs read/write file function to generate a README.md document.

name: Eat-Da-Burger!
body: This assignment involved using express to create routes and utilizing the Handlebars HTML template engine. This site was deployed to Heroku.
